mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.first_weight AS "firstWeight", a.add_weight AS "addWeight", a.carr_price_first AS "carrPriceFirst", a.carr_price_add AS "carrPriceAdd", a.province_id AS "provinceId", a.carr_id AS "carrId", a.channel_id AS "channelId", a.create_time AS "createTime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_channel_carriage_price( id, first_weight, add_weight, carr_price_first, carr_price_add, province_id, carr_id, channel_id, create_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{firstWeight}, #{addWeight}, #{carrPriceFirst}, #{carrPriceAdd}, #{provinceId}, #{carrId}, #{channelId}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fx_channel_carriage_price SET first_weight = #{firstWeight}, add_weight = #{addWeight}, carr_price_first = #{carrPriceFirst}, carr_price_add = #{carrPriceAdd}, province_id = #{provinceId}, carr_id = #{carrId}, channel_id = #{channelId}, create_time = #{createTime} WHERE id = #{id}
